summary: net/mlx5e: CT: Fix cleanup of CT before cleanup of TC ct rules
details:
net/mlx5e: CT: Fix cleanup of CT before cleanup of TC ct rules

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 11bcc79f4bcd244145e6a2c04d5dc755303492a8, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit d1a3138f7913014e0714cb1d3d44793d76fc38a1. For more details please see the references link.
